alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 10:16PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ulster and Dutchess Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1016 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pleasant Valley, or near Poughkeepsie, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, half inch hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Poughkeepsie, Kingston, New Paltz, Rhinebeck, Hyde Park, Milton, Pleasant Valley, Amenia, Highland, Pine Plains, Red Hook, Millbrook, Millerton, Stanfordville, Port Ewen, Fairview, Red Oaks Mill, Lake Katrine, Staatsburg and Wingdale. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 18 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
